name: Data Defense (itch) (Andayy)
description:
Description:

New malicious unknown organisms have been detected within the system, it is important that at all costs you prevent this from happening, use the systems in house defense kit to fight these viruses and preserve the data!

Features:

  • Varying turrets and enemies
  • Purchase turrets and upgrade them to pack a real punch
  • Increasing difficulty within waves and levels
    •  

Disclaimer:

All assets including code, models, textures, animations have been solely created by myself. Sound is the only aspect of this game, which is externally used. All sound was used from a fantastic artist called Eric Matyas, feel free to check out at https://soundimage.org

I therefore intend to make no money from this game and is entirely for personal / educational purposes.
